# font

**Instance Property**

The font that SceneKit uses to create geometry from the text.

## Declaration

```swift
var font: UIFont! { get set }
```

```swift
var font: NSFont! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the text geometry’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNText/string] property is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object, SceneKit uses this font to render the entire text. If the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNText/string] property is an an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] object, SceneKit uses this font for any portions of the string not containing style attributes.

The default font is Helvetica 36 point.

## Managing the Geometry’s Text Content

- **string**: The string object whose text the geometry represents.
